detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_create: NFS4_OP_CREATE, creates a non-regular entry.

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] Pointer to the compound request's data

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successfull, other values show an error.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_create_Free: frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_create.
Frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_create.
